scripts.buildall: npm run erpbuild && npm run shopbuild && npm run adminbuild &npm run shipbuild&npm run adminshipbuild
scripts.adminbuild: cross-env NODE_ENV=production node build/build.js --web admin  --port 8100 --out admin
scripts.adminhome: cross-env NODE_ENV=development node build/dev-server.js --router homeadmin.js --web admin --port 8300 --config confighome.js
scripts.adminhomebuild: cross-env NODE_ENV=production node build/build.js --router homeadmin.js --web admin  --out adminhome --config confighome.js
scripts.adminship: cross-env NODE_ENV=development node build/dev-server.js --router shipadmin.js --web admin --port 8500  --config configship.js
scripts.adminshipbuild: cross-env NODE_ENV=production node build/build.js --router shipadmin.js --web admin  --out adminship --config configship.js
scripts.shopbuild: cross-env NODE_ENV=production node build/build.js --web shop --port 8200 --out shop
scripts.shoptest: cross-env NODE_ENV=development node build/dev-server.js --web shop --html shoptest --port 8200
scripts.shoptestbuild: cross-env NODE_ENV=production node build/build.js --web shop --html shoptest --port 8200 --out shoptest
scripts.erpbuild: cross-env NODE_ENV=production node build/build.js --web erp --port 8000 --out erp
scripts.erptestbuild: cross-env NODE_ENV=production node build/build.js --web erp  --out erptest --config configtest.js
scripts.shipbuild: cross-env NODE_ENV=production node build/build.js --web ship --port 8400 --out ship
